name: Vive La Slime!
description:
Vive La Slime!

You are a slime trapped in a secret lab. Use the lab's turrets to launch yourself to freedom. 

Controls:

As a slime, move with WASD. Press E at the exit to move to the next level.

As a turret, aim with the mouse and launch with the left mouse button.

Press Escape to quit, and R to restart. 

Credits:

This is a solo project created for the Game Maker's Toolkit 2020 Game Jam. Art made in Aseprite, music made in Bosca Ceoil, game made in Unity. Font used is "I pixel you" by rodrigosrtz, downloaded from dafont.com.
